title: Euro-clearing system of Securities issued by the Government of Sri Lanka
decision_details: - It is essential to increase Treasury Bond Market facilities if more foreign investors are to be attracted. The Euro clearing system is helpful to popularize the Securities issued by the Government among the foreign investors as an open and flexible facility to reduce the complexity of transactions and to minimize the cost.  Accordingly, the proposal made by Hon. Ravi Karunanayake, the Minister of Finance, to establish a legal and regulatory framework to get the facility of Euro clearing system for the Securities of the Government of Sri Lanka, with a view to providing the foreign investors with direct and uninterrupted access to the Government Securities Market, creating a diversified base, was approved by the Cabinet.
